languages.text: "Моя вера пересилила разочарование и ненависть. Да, люди слабы и порочны, но не это важно. Главное, что буква закона Его совершенна, и она ведет меня — только она".

"My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."
languages.original_text: "Моя вера пересилила разочарование и ненависть. Да, люди слабы и порочны, но не это важно. Главное, что буква закона Его совершенна, и она ведет меня — только она".

traits.locale_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hate. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word and nothing else."

"My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."

languages.text: 「私の信仰は、失望や憎しみを乗り越えさせてくれました。人は弱く、欲や悪徳に満ちている―それは確かです。ですが、それは重要ではありません。重要なのは、皇帝陛下の法の条文が完全であり、それが私を導いてくれるということです。私を導くのは陛下の御言葉だけなのです」
languages.original_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."

traits.locale_text: 「私の信仰は、失望や憎しみを乗り越えさせてくれました。人は弱く、欲や悪徳に満ちている―それは確かです。ですが、それは重要ではありません。重要なのは、皇帝陛下の法の条文が完全であり、それが私を導いてくれるということです。私を導くのは陛下の御言葉だけなのです」

languages.text: "Mein Glaube hat meine Enttäuschung und meinen Hass überwunden. Es stimmt, dass die Leute schwach und voller Laster sind, aber darum geht es nicht. Wichtig ist nur, dass Sein Gesetz perfekt ist und mich leitet – Sein Wort und sonst nichts."
languages.original_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Glaube hat meine Enttäuschung und meinen Hass überwunden. Es stimmt, dass die Leute schwach und voller Laster sind, aber darum geht es nicht. Wichtig ist nur, dass Sein Gesetz perfekt ist und mich leitet – Sein Wort und sonst nichts."

languages.text: « Ma foi a surpassé ma déception et ma haine. Il est vrai que les humains sont faibles et vicieux, mais ce n'est pas le plus important. Ce qui compte vraiment, c'est que Sa loi est parfaite et que c'est Sa parole, et rien d'autre, qui me guide. »
languages.original_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."

traits.locale_text: « Ma foi a surpassé ma déception et ma haine. Il est vrai que les humains sont faibles et vicieux, mais ce n'est pas le plus important. Ce qui compte vraiment, c'est que Sa loi est parfaite et que c'est Sa parole, et rien d'autre, qui me guide. »

« Ma foi a surpassé ma déception et ma haine. Il est vrai que les humains sont faibles et vicieux, mais ce n'est pas le plus important. Ce qui compte vraiment, c'est que Sa loi est parfaite et que c'est Sa parole, et rien d'autre, qui me guide. »

languages.text: «Mi fe se ha impuesto a mi decepción y mi odio. Es verdad que la gente es débil y sucumbe a sus vicios, pero eso no es lo primordial. Lo único que importa es que Sus leyes son perfectas, y eso me sirve de guía: Su palabra y nada más».
languages.original_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."

traits.locale_text: «Mi fe se ha impuesto a mi decepción y mi odio. Es verdad que la gente es débil y sucumbe a sus vicios, pero eso no es lo primordial. Lo único que importa es que Sus leyes son perfectas, y eso me sirve de guía: Su palabra y nada más».

languages.text: “我的信念战胜了我心中的失望与恨意。人类很软弱，会犯下许多恶行，这是不争的事实。然而，这并不重要，重要的是，帝皇律法的字句是完美的，祂的律法指引着我。我只要聆听祂的话语即可，无需其他。”
languages.original_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."

traits.locale_text: “我的信念战胜了我心中的失望与恨意。人类很软弱，会犯下许多恶行，这是不争的事实。然而，这并不重要，重要的是，帝皇律法的字句是完美的，祂的律法指引着我。我只要聆听祂的话语即可，无需其他。”

languages.text: "İnancım, hissettiğim hayal kırıklığı ve nefrete üstün geldi. İnsanların zayıf ve kusurlarla dolu olduğu doğru ancak asıl önemli olan bu değil. Asıl önemli olan, O'nun Kanunu'nun harfi harfine mükemmel olduğu ve bana kılavuzluk ettiğidir. O'nun kelamı, doğru olan tek yoldur."
languages.original_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."

traits.locale_text: "İnancım, hissettiğim hayal kırıklığı ve nefrete üstün geldi. İnsanların zayıf ve kusurlarla dolu olduğu doğru ancak asıl önemli olan bu değil. Asıl önemli olan, O'nun Yasası'nın harfi harfine mükemmel olduğu ve bana kılavuzluk ettiğidir. O'nun kelamı, doğru olan tek yoldur."

"İnancım, hissettiğim hayal kırıklığı ve nefrete üstün geldi. İnsanların zayıf ve kusurlarla dolu olduğu doğru ancak asıl önemli olan bu değil. Asıl önemli olan, O'nun kanunlarının harfi harfine mükemmel olduğu ve bana kılavuzluk ettiğidir. O'nun kelâmı, doğru olan tek yoldur."

languages.original_text: "My faith has overpowered my disappointment and hatred. It is true that people are weak and full of vices, but that's not what's important. All that matters is that the letter of His Law is perfect, and that it guides me — His word, and nothing else."
